name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in building enterprise-scale applications, specializing in **Python**, **SQL**, **Airflow**, and **APIs**. Skilled in data modeling, data warehousing, and developing robust ETL and ELT pipelines, I leverage modern frameworks and methodologies to ensure data integrity and high performance across projects. I have a strong command over relational databases and advanced data storage solutions, along with a profound understanding of automated data quality processes. My proficiency in **DBT** combined with data architecture expertise places me at the forefront of transforming complex data into actionable insights.

In my previous roles, I successfully led cross-functional teams in an Agile environment, delivering projects through a commitment to teamwork and effective communication. Additionally, my technical toolkit includes **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with cloud services expertise in **Azure** and **AWS**. I emphasize critical thinking while implementing solutions that comply with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My hands-on approach with machine learning pipelines and MLOps using tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow** reflects my proactive attitude towards embracing innovative technologies.
